message: Fetal Heart rate should be between 80 bpm and 200 bpm
Height should be between 50 cm and 250 cm
Weight should be between 30 Kg and 400 Kg
Weight should be between 30 Kg and 400 Kg
BMI should be between 19 and 25
Number of pregnancies (gravida) should be between 1 and 15

conceptName: DAK, Number of miscarriages and/or abortions
message: Number of pregnancies (gravida) should be less thanNumber of previous pregnancies

maxValue: DAK, Number of previous pregnancies - DAK, Number of miscarriages and/or abortions
message: Number of live births should be less than difference of Number of previous pregnancy and Number of miscarriages and/or abortions

maxValue: DAK, Number of previous pregnancies - DAK, Number of miscarriages and/or abortions - DAK, Number of live births
message: Number of stillbirths should be less than than diffrence of Number of previous pregnancies, Number of miscarriages and/or abortions and Number of live births
Number of caesarian sections should be less than Parity
Systolic blood pressure should be between 60mmHg and 260mmHg
Repeat systolic blood pressure should be between 60mmHg and 260mmHg
Diastolic blood pressure should be between 60mmHg and 260mmHg
Repeat diastolic blood pressure should be between 60mmHg and 260mmHg
Body temperature should be between 350c and 42oc
Second body temperature should be between 350c and 42oc
Pulse rate should be between 50bpm and 200bpm
Second pulse rate should be between 50bpm and 200bpm
Oxygen Saturation should be between 0% and 100%
Cervical dilation should be between 0cm and 10cm
Symphysis-fundal height should be between 0cm and 44cm
Fetal heart rate should be between 80bpm and 200bpm
Second fetal heart rate should be between 80bpm and 200bpm
number of fetuses the woman is carrying should be between 1 and 8
ANC contact number should be between 1 and 14

conceptName: DAK, Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery
message: Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery should be 75mg

conceptName: DAK, Fasting Blood sugar test result
message: Fasting Blood sugar test result should be between 30 and 500

conceptName: Gestational Age Days in Current Week
message: The number of days must be from 0 to 6.
